title: How to play
goal: The objective of the game is to earn the fewest points in each round. The player with the fewest points at the end of the game is the winner.

selectCard.part1: Click on one or more cards in your hand to select it/them (see

deck: Click on the deck or on one card of the discard pile to draw a card

quickPlay.summary: Double-click on one of your cards to play it quickly (this is not considered a round). Two possible cases:
quickPlay.case1: You have just drawn a card of the same value as the one you have just discarded and the next player has not played
quickPlay.case2: Someone has put down a pair or three of a kind and you have a card of the same value and the next player hasn't played

yaniv.summary: If you have <1>7 or less</1> in your hand, press the Yaniv button to finish the round:
yaniv.winner: You win if no other player has a score less than or equal to yours and score <1>0 point</1>
yaniv.loser: You lose if at least one other player has a score less than or equal to yours and you score <1>30 points + the value of your hand</1>

cards.numbers: Numerical cards from <1>2 to 10</1> are worth their rank

end: The game ends when a player reaches <1>200 points</1>. The winner is the player with the fewest points
linkText: Learn more about the Yaniv and its rules
